person.persName: Benjamin J. Beall (Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer, clerk pro tem, and JP; captain 10th & 14th KY Cav CSA)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer, soldier, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Dora Beall. Father of Edward Beall, Lizzie Beall, Duke Beall, Alice Beall, Maria Beall, Fannie Beall, and Laura Beall. Farmer in Alexandria, Kentucky, in 1860. Carpenter in Campbell County in 1863. Served in the 10th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) and the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as captain from March 1863 to January 1864. Justice of the peace in Campbell County in 1864. Clerk pro-tem of the Campbell Circuit Court in 1864.
